sprint_goal: Establish foundational User Management, RBAC, and core Master Data models (User, Vehicle, Driver, Customer, Route, Material).
Build the core trip creation and assignment workflow, and complete the management of master data entities (vehicle/driver status, documents, customer locations).
Deliver the Minimum Viable Product (MVP) for the Driver Portal, enabling login, trip viewing, starting a trip, submitting expenses with validation, and uploading a Proof of Delivery (POD).
Implement trip exception handling (cancellation, events, on-hold) and establish the expense approval workflow with integrated trip profitability calculations.

Complete the full financial lifecycle, including advanced GST e-invoicing with error handling, payment recording, customer ledgers, and card/advance management. (This is a large sprint and could be split).

Launch real-time monitoring capabilities, including the full GPS tracking pipeline, live map view, geofencing, and the comprehensive system-wide alerting framework. (This is a large sprint and could be split).

Deliver all business intelligence features, including the manager dashboard with real-time KPIs and the complete suite of operational and financial reports with export functionality. (This is a large sprint and could be split).

Finalize system administration, data migration, and training. Complete all remaining master data and configuration stories, execute the data migration dry-run, and deliver user training materials for go-live readiness. (This is an epic-sized sprint representing the final phase of work).
